statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, country FROM users WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT username, email, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'F' AND country <> 'Canada'
SELECT user_id, country, gender FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE country IN ('USA', 'Canada') ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, category, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE category = 'Sports';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, category, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_score > 50 ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.recommended_product FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, p.category, p.preference_score FROM users u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.preference_score > 75 ORDER BY p.preference_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM user_preferences WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, product_name, category, price FROM user_preferences JOIN products ON user_preferences.product_id = products.product_id WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE date_of_preference > '2022-01-01' AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender FROM users WHERE age <= 25 OR gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT user_name, age FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 2 AND category = 'Food';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'View' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'view' AND category = 'Electronics';

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, p.product_name, i.interaction_type FROM users u INNER JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id INNER JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.category = 'Clothing' AND u.age < 50 ORDER BY u.user_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.user_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM users u LEFT JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id LEFT JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.price > 100 ORDER BY p.price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.user_name, COUNT(i.interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id GROUP BY u.user_name HAVING total_interactions > 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating, comment FROM ratings WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT products.name, products.category, purchases.purchase_date FROM products INNER JOIN purchases ON products.product_id = purchases.product_id;
SELECT users.username, AVG(ratings.rating) AS average_rating FROM users INNER JOIN ratings ON users.user_id = ratings.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING AVG(ratings.rating) > 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_recommendations DESC;
